TaskDescription: The toggle switch (keyboard shortcut is TAB) is designed to enter maunal mode. Use the top two black buttons and link them to entry piston's valves, when the switch is turned on. Test checks workipeces final position. Keep in mind, that piston needs to be moved back to the starting position. Make sure, that COMPRESSOR IS RUNNING and that preasure level is high enough!

ChatBubbles.Text: This is the switch to toggle between maunal (switch is rotated/active) and automatic mode.
